mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN (MAX(SUBSTR(ord_code, 4, 8)) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd')) THEN ('ORD' || TO_CHAR(MAX(SUBSTR(ord_code, 4, 12)) + 1)) ELSE ('ORD' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') || TO_CHAR(LPAD(1, 3, '0'))) END AS ord_code FROM ord

SELECT CASE WHEN (MAX(SUBSTR(lot, 4, 8)) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd')) THEN ('LOT' || TO_CHAR(MAX(SUBSTR(lot, 4, 12)) + 1)) ELSE ('LOT' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') || TO_CHAR(LPAD(1, 3, '0'))) END AS lot FROM prd_management
SELECT cp_code, cp_name, address FROM cp WHERE cp_type = '완제품'
SELECT prd_name, prd_code, bom_code, unit_price FROM prd

SELECT p.prd_name, p.prd_code, pm.lot, TO_CHAR(pm.md,'yyyy-mm-dd') MD, TO_CHAR(pm.ed, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ED, pm.stc_quantity
FROM prd p JOIN prd_management pm ON p.prd_code = pm.prd_code
WHERE p.prd_code = #{prdCode} AND pm.stc_quantity > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORD (ord_code, ord_date, dlv_req_date, cp_code, ord_status, comm) VALUES ( #{ordCode}, SYSDATE, #{dlvReqDate}, #{cpCode}, #{ordStatus}, #{comm})

INSERT INTO ORD_DETAIL (ord_detail_code, ord_code, prd_code, prd_name, ord_quantity, price) VALUES ('ORDDETAIL' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || ord_seq.NEXTVAL, #{ordCode}, #{productVO.prdCode}, #{productVO.prdName}, #{productVO.ordQuantity}, #{productVO.price})
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(od.ord_quantity), 0) FROM ord O JOIN ord_detail od ON o.ord_code = od.ord_code WHERE od.prd_code = #{prdCode} AND od.ord_code = #{ordCode}

SELECT o.ord_code, c.cp_name, o.ord_date, o.dlv_req_date, o.ord_status, o.comm FROM ord o LEFT JOIN cp c ON o.cp_code = c.cp_code WHERE 1 = 1
AND c.cp_name LIKE '%' || #{companyName} || '%'
AND TRUNC(o.ord_date) >= TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{orderStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
AND TRUNC(o.ord_date) <= TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{orderEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
AND TRUNC(o.dlv_req_date) >= TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{deliveryStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
AND TRUNC(o.dlv_req_date) <= TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{deliveryEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
AND o.ord_status = #{orderStatus}
ORDER BY o.ord_date DESC

SELECT o.ord_code, c.cp_name, o.ord_date, o.dlv_req_date, o.ord_status, o.comm
FROM ord o LEFT JOIN cp c ON o.cp_code = c.cp_code ORDER BY o.ord_date DESC, o.ord_status

WITH lackQuantity AS ( SELECT prd_code, SUM(stc_quantity) AS stc_quantity FROM prd_management GROUP BY prd_code ) SELECT o.ord_code AS ordCode, od.prd_name AS prdName, od.prd_code AS prdCode, od.ord_quantity AS ordQuantity, o.ord_status AS ordStatus, GREATEST(od.ord_quantity - NVL(stc_quantity, 0), 0) AS lackQuantity, NVL(stc_quantity, 0) AS stc_quantity FROM ord o JOIN ord_detail od ON o.ord_code = od.ord_code LEFT OUTER JOIN lackQuantity ON od.prd_code = lackQuantity.prd_code WHERE o.ord_code = #{ordCode}

SELECT p.prd_name, p.prd_code, p.unit_price, COALESCE(SUM(pm.stc_quantity), 0) AS stcQuantity FROM prd p LEFT JOIN prd_management pm ON p.prd_code = pm.prd_code GROUP BY p.prd_name, p.prd_code, p.unit_price

SELECT o.ord_code, c.cp_name, o.ord_date, o.dlv_req_date, o.ord_status, o.comm
FROM ord o LEFT JOIN cp c ON o.cp_code = c.cp_code WHERE ord_status = #{status} ORDER BY o.ord_date DESC
SELECT p.prd_name, p.prd_code, pm.lot, pm.md, pm.ed, pm.stc_quantity FROM prd p JOIN prd_management pm ON p.prd_code = pm.prd_code
SELECT p.prd_name, p.prd_code, pm.lot, pm.md, pm.ed, pm.stc_quantity FROM prd p JOIN prd_management pm ON p.prd_code = pm.prd_code
SELECT o.ord_code, c.cp_name, o.ord_date, o.dlv_req_date, o.ord_status FROM ord o JOIN cp c ON o.cp_code = c.cp_code

WITH r AS (SELECT ord_code, prd_code, SUM(out_quantity) remain_Quantity FROM prd_out_history GROUP BY ord_code, prd_code)
SELECT o.ord_code AS ordCode, od.prd_name AS prdName, od.prd_code AS prdCode, od.ord_quantity AS ordQuantity, o.ord_status AS ordStatus, od.ord_quantity - r.remain_Quantity AS remainQuantity FROM ord o JOIN ord_detail od ON o.ord_code = od.ord_code JOIN r ON (r.ord_code = od.ord_code AND r.prd_code = od.prd_code) WHERE o.ord_code = #{ordCode} AND r.prd_code = #{prdCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prd_out_history(out_no, lot, prd_code, out_quantity, out_date, ord_code, cp_name) VALUES(out_seq.NEXTVAL + 3, #{lot}, #{prdCode}, #{outQuantity}, SYSDATE, #{ordCode}, #{cpName})
mapper.select: SELECT pm.lot, p.prd_name, pm.in_date, pm.ed, pm.in_quantity FROM prd_management pm JOIN prd p ON pm.prd_code = p.prd_code ORDER BY pm.in_date DESC

SELECT poh.LOT AS "lot", p.PRD_NAME AS "prdName", poh.OUT_QUANTITY AS "outQuantity", poh.OUT_DATE AS "outDate", poh.CP_NAME AS "cpName", poh.ORD_CODE AS "ordCode" FROM prd_out_history poh LEFT JOIN prd p ON p.prd_code = poh.prd_code ORDER BY poh.OUT_DATE DESC, poh.LOT

SELECT pm.lot, p.prd_name, pm.in_date, pm.ed, pm.in_quantity FROM prd_management pm JOIN prd p ON pm.prd_code = p.prd_code WHERE 1 = 1
AND p.prd_name LIKE '%' || #{prdName} || '%'
AND TRUNC(pm.in_date) >= TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{inStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
AND TRUNC(pm.in_date) <= TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{inEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
ORDER BY pm.in_date DESC

SELECT poh.LOT AS "lot", p.PRD_NAME AS "prdName", poh.OUT_QUANTITY AS "outQuantity", poh.OUT_DATE AS "outDate", poh.CP_NAME AS "cpName", poh.ORD_CODE AS "ordCode" FROM prd_out_history poh LEFT JOIN prd p ON p.prd_code = poh.prd_code WHERE 1 = 1
AND p.prd_name LIKE '%' || #{prdName} || '%'
AND poh.cp_name LIKE '%' || #{cpName} || '%'
AND TRUNC(poh.out_date) >= TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{outStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
AND TRUNC(poh.out_date) <= TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{outEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
ORDER BY poh.OUT_DATE DESC, poh.ord_code
